description:
Course description

Learn how to prepare simple, quick and tasty recipes with no prior skills needed. Would you like to discover what you can really do in your kitchen with a few ingredients, with limited time and with very little commitment? If your answer is yes, this course is for you.

Build a strong foundation in italian cooking basics from the preparation of pasta to the preparation of tasty main courses with a meticulously step by step guide that will take you straight to the goal of cooking better meals.

What you are going to learn:

  • learn to know your pasta
  • basic sauces to use with different recipes
  • quick and tasty recipes from the neapolitan kitchen
  • the italian cooking workflow

You will master all these recipes and at the same time you will improve your overall cooking skills.

  • cooking pasta the right way
  • the easiest recipe in the world
  • spaghetti puttanesca style
  • spaghetti puveriello style
  • bow tie with cream and salmon
  • broken spaghetti with potatoes

  • steak with tomatoes
  • neapolitan meatballs
  • mediterranean style cod
  • shrimps in pink sauce
  • tarts with tuna sauce

What you will get at the end of this course?

  • over 30 lectures and about an hour of contents
  • mastering the basic procedures in cooking pasta and sauces
  • your overall cooking skills improved with a lot of cooking tips
  • cooking Italian recipes in your own kitchen in no time


What are the minimum requirements? Nothing strange

  • You need a kitchen
  • You need the list of ingredients to cook your recipes
  • You need no prior knowledge on cooking
title: Learn to cook italian! Traditional recipes from Napoli
